title: I really don't want to tell people what they can and can't draw but.
body:
Please stop drawing characters like Darius if you can't handle drawing mountains of meat.

Darius is defined as a mountain of meat. He should NEVER be drawn with stick figure arms.

If you want to draw Ezreal or Varus, then draw Ezreal or Varus. They fit your art style perfectly.

Just really sick of seeing Darius art where his arms are skinnier than an Ethiopian child.
